org.sd.crawl
Class BaseSiteInfoModule

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.crawl.BaseSiteInfoModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
SiteInfoModule
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseSuccessfulSiteInfoModule, ErrorPageModule, UrlExtensionModule
public abstract class BaseSiteInfoModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements SiteInfoModule

A base implementation of a site info module for keeping track of histogram and url data.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Detail

addString

protected final boolean addString(java.lang.String hstring,
                                  java.lang.String url)
Add a string to the histogram.

Adding a null hstring does not affect the histogram, but increments the totalSubmittedCount; non-null hstrings (including empty) are added to the histogram and the totalAddedCount is incremented.

The url is added only if it and the hstring are non-null and the url itself is non-empty.

Returns:
true if the hstring was added to the histogram; otherwise, false.

getHistogram

public Histogram<java.lang.String> getHistogram()
Get the extensions histogram.

Specified by:
getHistogram in interface SiteInfoModule
Returns:
the histogram, or null if not applicable.
